5#ifndef V8_PROFILER_TICK_SAMPLE_H_
6#define V8_PROFILER_TICK_SAMPLE_H_
7
8#include "include/v8-unwinder.h"
9#include "src/base/platform/time.h"
10#include "src/common/globals.h"
11
12namespace v8 {
13namespace internal {
14
15class Isolate;
16
17// TickSample captures the information collected for each sample.
18struct V8_EXPORT TickSample {
19 // Internal profiling (with --prof + tools/$OS-tick-processor) wants to
20 // include the runtime function we're calling. Externally exposed tick
21 // samples don't care.
22 enum RecordCEntryFrame { kIncludeCEntryFrame, kSkipCEntryFrame };
23
24 TickSample() {}
25
38 void Init(Isolate* isolate, const v8::RegisterState& state,
39 RecordCEntryFrame record_c_entry_frame, bool update_stats,
40 bool use_simulator_reg_state = true,
41 base::TimeDelta sampling_interval = base::TimeDelta());
69 static bool GetStackSample(Isolate* isolate, v8::RegisterState* state,
70 RecordCEntryFrame record_c_entry_frame,
71 void** frames, size_t frames_limit,
72 v8::SampleInfo* sample_info,
73 StateTag* out_state = nullptr,
74 bool use_simulator_reg_state = true);
75
76 void print() const;
77
78 static constexpr unsigned kMaxFramesCountLog2 = 8;
79 static constexpr unsigned kMaxFramesCount = (1 << kMaxFramesCountLog2) - 1;
80
81 void* pc = nullptr; // Instruction pointer.
82 union {
83 void* tos; // Top stack value (*sp).
84 void* external_callback_entry = nullptr;
85 };
86 void* context = nullptr; // Address of the incumbent native context.
87 void* embedder_context = nullptr; // Address of the embedder native context.
88
89 base::TimeTicks timestamp;
90 base::TimeDelta sampling_interval_; // Sampling interval used to capture.
91
92 StateTag state = OTHER; // The state of the VM.
93 EmbedderStateTag embedder_state = EmbedderStateTag::EMPTY;
94
95 uint16_t frames_count = 0; // Number of captured frames.
96 static_assert(sizeof(frames_count) * kBitsPerByte >= kMaxFramesCountLog2);
97 bool has_external_callback = false;
98 // Whether the sample should update aggregated stats.
99 bool update_stats_ = true;
100
101 void* stack[kMaxFramesCount]; // Call stack.
102};
103
104} // namespace internal
105} // namespace v8
106
107#endif // V8_PROFILER_TICK_SAMPLE_H_
